name: Out Of Controls (Osoka)
description:
Are you ready for a platformer with a limit on controls?

I am not, but maybe you. You can see how many controls you have left above your character (so look there occasionally ;-) and there are collectibles with which you can gain (and lose) your controls.

Controls

Move - AD
Jump - Space

Credits

Programming & Design: Osoka

Art (Tileset & Character): https://o-lobster.itch.io/platformmetroidvania-pixel-art-asset-pack

Art (Backgrounds): https://edermunizz.itch.io/pixel-art-plataformer-painted-style

Art (Buttons): https://retrocademedia.itch.io/buttonprompts4

SFX: https://beepyeah.itch.io/8-bit-sfx-pack

Music:  https://kenney.itch.io/kenney-game-assets-1

Font: https://somepx.itch.io/humble-fonts-gold

Game made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020
